name: Roc Technologies
tagline: Berkshire IT Support and Services Company
description: Roc provides services and solutions that help leaders to succeed. Our customers work with us to transform their business processes, project delivery and technology. We work with enterprise customers, the public sector and via partners delivering managed services, advice, implementations and solutions. From process mapping and project advice to networks and data centre, Roc helps you deliver on your objectives.

locations.address: Roc Technologies Ltd. Wharf House, Wharf Street, Newbury
